file.name: openapi.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.1
info:
  title: Classifier
  version: "1.0"
servers:
- url: https://127.0.0.1:5000/v1
security:
  - BasicAuth: []
paths:
  /model:
    post:
      summary: Add training data
      operationId: training_data_load
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/SampleCollection'
        required: true
      responses:
        405:
          description: Invalid input
          content: 
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ApiResponse'
        401:
          description: Not Authorized
          content: 
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ApiResponse'
        201:
          description: Created
          content: 
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ApiResponse'
  /model/{name}/tests:
    post:
      summary: Provide Hyperparameter and Test
      operationId: training_data_test
      parameters:
      - name: name
        in: path
        description: Training Data Name
        required: true
        schema: 
          type: string
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/Hyperparameter'
      responses:
        200:
          description: Test Results
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Hyperparameter'
        400:
          description: Invalid Hyperparameter Value
          content: 
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ApiResponse'
        401:
          description: Not Authorized
          content: 
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ApiResponse'
        404:
          description: Unknown Training Data Name
          content: 
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ApiResponse'
  /model/{name}/classify:
    get:
      summary: Classify a Sample
      operationId: training_data_classify
      parameters:
      - name: name
        in: path
        description: Training Data Name
        required: true
        schema: 
          type: string
      - name: sample
        in: query
        description: Sample to Classify
        required: true
        schema:
          type: object
      responses:
        200:
          description: successful classification
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Sample'
        401:
          description: Not Authorized
          content: 
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ApiResponse'
        400:
          description: Invalid Sample
          content: 
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ApiResponse'
        404:
          description: Unknown Training Data Name
          content: 
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ApiResponse'

components:
  schemas:
    Hyperparameter:
      type: object
      required:
        - distance
        - k
      properties:
        summary:
          type: string
        distance:
          type: string
        k:
          type: integer
          maximum: 1
        quality:
          type: number
    Sample:
      required:
      - petal_length
      - petal_width
      - sepal_length
      - sepal_width
      type: object
      properties:
        petal_length:
          type: number
        petal_width:
          type: number
        sepal_length:
          type: number
        sepal_width:
          type: number
        species:
          type: string
        classification:
          type: string
    SampleCollection:
      type: array
      items: 
        $ref: '#/components/schemas/Sample'
    ApiResponse:
      type: object
      properties:
        code:
          type: integer
        type:
          type: string
        message:
          type: string
  securitySchemes:
    BasicAuth:
      type: http
      scheme: basic
